text: Aika! Allahacyacakarita visud'dha (nirbhela) upasana karane ahe,1 ani jya lokanni tyacyakherija avaliya banavuna thevale aheta (ani ase mhanatata) ki amhi yanci upasana kevala evadhyasathi karato ki he (bujurga, thora) amhala allahacya nikata karatila, he loka jya gostibabata matabheda karita aheta, tica (n'yayasangata) phaisala allaha svatah karila, khotya ani krtaghna lokanna allaha marga dakhavita nahi
